short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that open a new tab, the background of the tab will show a beautiful and biking scene.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The perfect place to be if you're a Cycling lover.
Enhance any new tab with exciting images for Cycling lovers.
When opening a new tab, the background of the tab will show a beautiful and exciting Cycling scene.

The new tab  embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing. No changes to your browser default search settings will be made.

By installing BikeExtension Cycling extension, you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy elaborated on Horizon-grp website:

End User License Agreement: https://qltymedia.com/bike_extension/#eula

Privacy Policy: https://qltymedia.com/bike_extension/#privacy_policy

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
